attributes.death: Hanged for for treason by House Stark

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' books, Karstark and his men murdered Willem Lannister and his cousin Tion Frey. Karstark's lookout is similarly executed last to watch his companions die before him.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
He is one of [[Rickard Karstark]]'s men.

===[[Season 3]]===
He acts as a lookout when Rickard and his men murdered [[Martyn Lannister|Martyn]] and [[Willem Lannister]]. When [[Robb Stark]] orders that Karstark's accomplices be hanged, he protests that he was only the lookout. Robb then orders him to be executed last so that he may watch the others die.<ref>"[[Kissed by Fire]]"</ref>
